### VERSION ###
DKSET(CHARTJS_MAJOR_VERSION 2)
DKSET(CHARTJS_MINOR_VERSION 9)
DKSET(CHARTJS_BUILD_VERSION 4)
DKSET(CHARTJS_VERSION Chart.js-${CHARTJS_MAJOR_VERSION}.${CHARTJS_MINOR_VERSION}.${CHARTJS_BUILD_VERSION})

### INSTALL ###
DKINSTALL(https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/Chart.js/3.1.1/chart.min.js Chart.js ${CHARTJS_VERSION})
DKSET(CHARTJS ${3RDPARTY}/${CHARTJS_VERSION})
